org.raistlic.common.config.source

Class ConfigSourceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.raistlic.common.config.source.ConfigSourceFactory

  • public final class ConfigSourceFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Static factory methods holder, exports different types of ConfigSource instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ConfigSource immutableCopyOf(ConfigSource configSource)
      The method creates an immutable ConfigSource copy based on the values from the given configSource .
      static ConfigSource immutableCopyOf(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
      The method creates an immutable ConfigSource based on the values from the specified map .
      static ConfigSource immutableCopyOf(java.util.Properties properties)
      The method creates an immutable ConfigSource based on the values from the specified properties .
      static ConfigSource immutableEmptySource()
      The method returns a singleton instance of an immutable, empty ConfigSource .
      static ConfigSource wrap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
      The method wraps the specified map and creates an instance that adapts to the ConfigSource interface, which redirects all queries to the map .
      static ConfigSource wrap(java.util.Properties properties)
      The method wraps the specified properties and creates an instance that adapts to the ConfigSource interface, which redirects all queries to the properties .

        public static ConfigSource immutableCopyOf(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
        The method creates an immutable ConfigSource based on the values from the specified map .
        Parameters:
        map - the map based on which values to create the instance, cannot be null.
        Returns:
        the immutable instance created.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when map is null.

        the immutable instance created.

      • immutableCopyOf

        public static ConfigSource immutableCopyOf(ConfigSource configSource)
        The method creates an immutable ConfigSource copy based on the values from the given configSource .
        Parameters:
        configSource - the config source instance based on which values to create the copy, cannot be null.
        Returns:
        the immutable instance created.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when properties is null.

      • wrap

        public static ConfigSource wrap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
        The method wraps the specified map and creates an instance that adapts to the ConfigSource interface, which redirects all queries to the map .
        Parameters:
        map - the map to be wrapped, cannot be null.
        Returns:
        the created wrapper instance.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when map is null.

      • wrap

        public static ConfigSource wrap(java.util.Properties properties)
        The method wraps the specified properties and creates an instance that adapts to the ConfigSource interface, which redirects all queries to the properties .
        Parameters:
        properties - the properties to be wrapped, cannot be null.
        Returns:
        the created wrapper instance.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when map is null.
